executable.title: Convert Tubes to Surface (TubeTK)
executable.description: Renders ITK tube SpatialObject data structures into polygons representing the wall of the tubes. The .vtk and .stl file formats are supported.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

file.name: outputSurfaceFile
file.label: Output Surface File
file.description: File to place the rendered tube wall.

parameters.label: Rendering Options
parameters.description: Parameters that effect how the surface is created
